languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}Вкрадчивый шепот сплетает слова в вашем сознании{/d}, подобно прихотливому нечестивому узору.{/n} "Приспешники фальшивого бога, не знающие единства, слепые в своей вере. Им не познать Истины... в отличие от тебя. Я укажу тебе путь, Дитя Рассвета, но чтобы ступить на него, тебе надо укрыть наши намерения за фасадом преданности трупу на троне. Пока что внимай плану ложноверцев и готовься. Сейчас время слушать. Время действовать настанет позже — я поведаю тебе, когда оно придет".

{n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}A silky whisper weaves words{/d} into a kind of unholy pattern in your mind:{/n} "Minions of a false god. Blind in their faith. No unity among them. They will never learn the Truth... but you will. I will show you the path, Child of the Dawn, but in order to walk that path, you must hide our intentions behind a facade of loyalty to the corpse emperor. For now, learn about the false believers' plan and prepare. Now is the time to listen. The time to act will come later, and when it comes, I will tell you."
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}Вкрадчивый шепот сплетает слова в вашем сознании{/d}, подобно прихотливому нечестивому узору.{/n} "Приспешники фальшивого бога, не знающие единства, слепые в своей вере. Им не познать Истины... в отличие от тебя. Я укажу тебе путь, Дитя Рассвета, но чтобы ступить на него, тебе надо укрыть наши намерения за фасадом преданности трупу на троне. Пока что внимай плану ложноверцев и готовься. Сейчас время слушать. Время действовать настанет позже — я поведаю тебе, когда оно придет".

traits.locale_text: {n}A suave whisper weaves words into a kind of unholy ornament in your mind.{/n} "Minions of a false god. Blind in their faith. No unity among them. They will never learn the Truth... but you will. I will show you the path, Child of the Dawn, but in order to walk that path, you must hide our intentions behind a façade of loyalty to the corpse emperor. For now, learn about the false believers' plan and prepare. Now is a time to listen. A time to act will come later, and when it comes, I will tell you."

languages.text: {n}某个丝滑的{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}耳语声在你的脑海中响了起来{/d}，话语中充满了邪恶的意图。{/n}“那些伪神的仆从，他们追随着盲目的信仰，彼此不和，永远都无法得知真相……但你会看到真相。我会为你指明道路，黎明之子，但若要踏上这条道路，你必须假装对尸皇的保持忠诚，这样才能隐藏我们的意图。好了，了解那些伪神信徒的计划与准备工作吧，倾听的时候到了。行动的时机还要再等等，等时机成熟之后，我会告诉你的。”
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}A silky whisper weaves words{/d} into a kind of unholy pattern in your mind:{/n} "Minions of a false god. Blind in their faith. No unity among them. They will never learn the Truth... but you will. I will show you the path, Child of the Dawn, but in order to walk that path, you must hide our intentions behind a facade of loyalty to the corpse emperor. For now, learn about the false believers' plan and prepare. Now is the time to listen. The time to act will come later, and when it comes, I will tell you."

traits.locale_text: {n}某个柔和的耳语声在你的脑海中响了起来，话语中充满了邪恶的意图。{/n}“那些伪神的仆从，他们追随着盲目的信仰，彼此不和，永远都无法得知真相……但你会看到真相。我会为你指明道路，黎明之子，但若要踏上这条道路，你必须假装对尸皇的保持忠诚，这样才能隐藏我们的意图。好了，了解那些伪神信徒的计划与准备工作吧，倾听的时候到了。行动的时机还要再等等，等时机成熟之后，我会告诉你的。”

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}Eine samtene Stimme webt Worte{/d} in deinem Verstand zu einem unheiligen Muster:{/n} "Schergen eines falschen Gottes. Blind in ihrem Glauben. Keine Einheit unter ihnen. Sie werden die Wahrheit nie erfahren ... Ihr dagegen schon. Ich zeige Euch den Pfad, Kind der Dämmerung, doch um diesen Pfad zu beschreiten, müsst Ihr Eure Absichten hinter eine Fassade der Loyalität gegenüber dem Leichenimperator verbergen. Vorerst werdet Ihr alles über den Plan der falschen Gläubigen lernen und Euch vorbereiten. Nun ist die Zeit zum Zuhören. Die Zeit zum Handeln kommt später, und wenn sie kommt, werde ich es Euch sagen."
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}A silky whisper weaves words{/d} into a kind of unholy pattern in your mind:{/n} "Minions of a false god. Blind in their faith. No unity among them. They will never learn the Truth... but you will. I will show you the path, Child of the Dawn, but in order to walk that path, you must hide our intentions behind a facade of loyalty to the corpse emperor. For now, learn about the false believers' plan and prepare. Now is the time to listen. The time to act will come later, and when it comes, I will tell you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine sanfte Stimme webt Worte in deinem Verstand zu einem unheiligen Ornament.{/n} "Schergen eines falschen Gottes. Blind in ihrem Glauben. Keine Einheit unter ihnen. Sie werden die Wahrheit nie erfahren ... Ihr dagegen schon. Ich zeige Euch den Pfad, Kind der Dämmerung, doch um diesen Pfad zu beschreiten, müsst Ihr Eure Absichten hinter eine Fassade der Loyalität gegenüber dem Leichenimperator verbergen. Vorerst werdet Ihr alles über den Plan der falschen Gläubigen lernen und Euch vorbereiten. Nun ist die Zeit zum Zuhören. Die Zeit zum Handeln kommt später, und wenn sie kommt, werde ich es Euch sagen."

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}Un susurro sedoso teje sus palabras{/d} hasta formar un tapiz impío en tu mente.{/n} «Esbirros de un falso dios. Su fe los ciega. No existe unidad entre ellos. Jamás descubrirán la Verdad... pero tú sí. Yo te mostraré el camino, Vástago del Amanecer, pero para recorrerlo deberás ocultar nuestras intenciones tras una fachada de lealtad al cadavérico emperador. De momento, averigua cuál es el plan de los falsos creyentes y prepárate. Es momento de escuchar. El momento para actuar ya llegará luego, y cuando lo haga, yo te avisaré».
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}A silky whisper weaves words{/d} into a kind of unholy pattern in your mind:{/n} "Minions of a false god. Blind in their faith. No unity among them. They will never learn the Truth... but you will. I will show you the path, Child of the Dawn, but in order to walk that path, you must hide our intentions behind a facade of loyalty to the corpse emperor. For now, learn about the false believers' plan and prepare. Now is the time to listen. The time to act will come later, and when it comes, I will tell you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un susurro zalamero teje sus palabras hasta formar un tapiz impío en tu mente.{/n} «Esbirros de un falso dios. Su fe los ciega. No existe unidad entre ellos. Jamás descubrirán la Verdad... pero tú sí. Yo te mostraré el camino, Vástago del Amanecer, pero para recorrerlo deberás ocultar nuestras intenciones tras una fachada de lealtad al cadavérico emperador. De momento, averigua cuál es el plan de los falsos creyentes y prepárate. Es momento de escuchar. El momento para actuar ya llegará luego, y cuando lo haga, yo te avisaré».

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}Un murmure suave tisse des paroles{/d} qui forment comme un motif impie dans votre esprit.{/n} « Les sbires d'un faux dieu, à la foi aveugle et sans la moindre unité. Ils n'apprendront jamais la vérité... contrairement à vous. Je vous montrerai la voie, Enfant de l'Aube, mais pour l'emprunter, vous devrez dissimuler nos intentions sous des airs de loyauté envers l'Empereur-Cadavre. Pour l'instant, apprenez-en davantage sur les projets des faux croyants et préparez-vous. L'heure est à l'écoute. Celle des actes viendra plus tard ; le moment venu, je vous le dirai. »
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}A silky whisper weaves words{/d} into a kind of unholy pattern in your mind:{/n} "Minions of a false god. Blind in their faith. No unity among them. They will never learn the Truth... but you will. I will show you the path, Child of the Dawn, but in order to walk that path, you must hide our intentions behind a facade of loyalty to the corpse emperor. For now, learn about the false believers' plan and prepare. Now is the time to listen. The time to act will come later, and when it comes, I will tell you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un murmure suave tisse des paroles qui forment comme une parure impie dans votre esprit.{/n} « Les sbires d'un faux dieu, à la foi aveugle et sans la moindre unité. Ils n'apprendront jamais la vérité... contrairement à vous. Je vous montrerai la voie, enfant de l'Aube, mais pour l'emprunter, vous devrez dissimuler nos intentions sous des airs de loyauté envers l'Empereur-Cadavre. Pour l'instant, découvrez les projets des faux croyants et préparez-vous. L'heure est à l'écoute. Celle des actes viendra plus tard ; le moment venu, je vous le dirai. »

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}巧みなささやき{/d}が心の中で言葉を邪悪なパターンのように紡ぐ。{/n}「偽の神の手先。盲目的な信念。彼らの間に団結はない。彼らは決して真実を学ぶことはない…しかし、あなたは学ぶだろう。暁の子よ、あなたに道を示そう。だが、その道を歩むためには、死体の皇帝へ見せかけの忠誠を示し、その裏に我々の意図を隠さなければならない。今は偽信者たちの計画を学び、準備をするといい。今は耳を傾ける時だ。行動を起こす時は後でやってくる。その時が来たら、知らせよう」
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}A silky whisper weaves words{/d} into a kind of unholy pattern in your mind:{/n} "Minions of a false god. Blind in their faith. No unity among them. They will never learn the Truth... but you will. I will show you the path, Child of the Dawn, but in order to walk that path, you must hide our intentions behind a facade of loyalty to the corpse emperor. For now, learn about the false believers' plan and prepare. Now is the time to listen. The time to act will come later, and when it comes, I will tell you."

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}İpeksi bir fısıltı, sözcükleri{/d} kâfirce bir ağ misali zihnine işliyor.{/n} "Sahte bir tanrının köleleri. İnançlarında boğulmuş. Aralarında birlik yok. Hakikat'i asla öğrenemeyecekler... Ancak sen öğreneceksin. Sana yolu göstereceğim Şafak Evladı ancak bu yolda yürümek için ceset imparatora sadakat maskesinin ardına saklanmalısın. Şimdilik sahte inananların planını öğrenmeye bakıp kendini hazırla. Zaman, dinleme zamanıdır. Harekete geçeceğin günler de gelecek, geldiğinde sana haber vereceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}A silky whisper weaves words{/d} into a kind of unholy pattern in your mind:{/n} "Minions of a false god. Blind in their faith. I will show you the path, Child of the Dawn, but in order to walk that path, you must hide our intentions behind a facade of loyalty to the corpse emperor.
